metadata.title: CVE-2020-15945 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Lua through 5.4.0 has a segmentation fault in changedline in ldebug.c(e.g., when called by luaG_traceexec) because it incorrectly expects thatan oldpc value is always updated upon a return of the flow of control to afunction.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.1-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
